name: Robert Mils
description: I’m fun loving, an achiever, possibly a romantic. I do pay more attention to minute detail. Possibly finding a woman with Love of History and some literature would be nice. Someone who wants to travel to experience historic sites or just bimble through old towns and stop for coffee.I am open to learning new things and ways of life. I am a simple person with simple needs and desires. I am frugal and live modestly. A great listener, gentle, thoughtful, faithful. I laugh a lot and love repartee. Loving and caring, I would love to bring out the best in you.
